name: Project Island
description:
Controls:

WASD to move the boat

Left click to add land/grass/trees

Right click to remove land/grass/trees

Spacebar to switch current item

Objective: Have as many sheep survive for as long as possible

Rules: 

Sheep eat grass when hungry

Bears eat your sheep when hungry

Both bears and sheep will reproduce when next to trees and when not hungry

You earn 1 point each second, 2 points for each sheep born and lose one point for each dead sheep

You can place more land between the islands, and more grass and trees in the islands
